pullRequest.title: OAuth Scim Service - Issue 769 - change password regex
pullRequest.bodyText:
Changed the password regex and added tests to fix issue #769
Source Format + Organize Imports on common-service, oauth-scim-service modules.

Referred How to validate a Password using Regular Expressions in Java for regex example.

commit.message:
Changed password regex and added tests, code formatted + organize imports using STS IDE

Changed password regex and added tests, code formatted + organize imports using STS IDE

nodes.bodyText:
the last part to prevent spaces is incorrect, you need (?=\S+$),
^(?=.*[0-9])(?=.*[a-z])(?=.*[A-Z])(?=.*[^a-zA-Z0-9])(?=\S+$).{8,64}$
please also add a test where length > 64
